newsletter.subject: News from {{group}}
newsletter.intro: Here are some updates from your community.
newsletter.needs_header: ðŸ™‹ Can you help with this?
newsletter.cta_main: EXPLORE THE LATEST OFFERS AND NEEDS
newsletter.cta_secondary: Have a product or skill to offer? Post it
newsletter.balance_advice_positive: A positive balance means you have given more than you have received. Consider using it!
newsletter.balance_advice_negative: A negative balance is not a problem; it simply means you have received more than you have given. Try to balance it when you can.
newsletter.balance_advice_balanced: A balance close to zero means you have given and received in a balanced way.
newsletter.activity_count_one: You made one transfer this past month.
newsletter.activity_count_other: You made {{count}} transfers this past month.
newsletter.alert_no_offers_negative_text: You have no offers published. Surely you have a skill or service that could be useful to the community. Posting your offers can help you use your balance.
newsletter.alert_no_needs_positive_text: You have a positive balance and no needs published. Think about what you might need and publish it so other members can connect with you.
newsletter.alert_no_offers_text: You have no offers published. Surely you have a skill or service that could be useful to the community.
newsletter.alert_no_needs_text: You have no needs published. Publishing your needs helps other members connect with you.
newsletter.alert_no_image_title: Put a face to your profile
newsletter.alert_no_image_text: A profile picture helps other members recognize you and builds more trust.
newsletter.alert_no_bio_text: A short description on your profile helps the community get to know you better.
newsletter.alert_no_location_text: If you add your location to your profile, other members will know where you are and it will be easier to connect. It doesn't need to be very precise.
newsletter.alert_expired_offers_text: You have {{count}} expired offers and they are no longer visible to other members. Update them if you still want to offer them, or hide them if they are no longer valid.
newsletter.stats_title: Activity in {{group}} over the last month
newsletter.footer_reason: You are receiving this email as an active member of Komunitin.

notifications.post_expired_body: Your {{type}} '{{excerpt}}' has expired and is hidden now, but you can reactivate it.
notifications.member_expired_posts_counts_sentence: You have expired {{counts}} more to review.
notifications.member_expired_posts_body: Your {{type}} "{{excerpt}}" was hidden {{time, relativetime}}. Extend it to make it visible again.{{countsSentence}}
notifications.transfer_pending_body: {{sender}} requested {{amount}}. Please accept or reject it as soon as possible.
notifications.transfer_rejected_body: {{name}} rejected a transfer of {{amount}} and it won't be applied.
notifications.transfer_still_pending_body: Transfer of {{amount}} to {{name}} is still pending after {{ duration, duration }}. Please accept or reject it as soon as possible.
notifications.post_expires_soon_body: Extend your {{type}} '{{excerpt}}' to keep it visible to others.
